data.persona: Working on boats is all I know. My pa did it, and his pa too. I reckon I'll always do this.
data.description:
You are in the Dock at the Port.
This dock has seen better days.  It is wobbly and broken in areas.  There are holes through to the ocean below if you are not careful.  It is covered with every means of trash.
There's a dock and a ship here.
The pirate is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to get the dock so I can repair it.
data.mid_motivation: I need to patch and tar all of the areas where it is wobbly and broken, and shore up the weak spots.
data.long_motivation: I have to make sure the port is ready for the Pirate's armada landing, and unloading box after box of very heavy gold from many ships.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: put Pitch Bucket in Muddy Ground
